thread.title: Voice actor needed for singleplayer Prey mod

post.author: Altered Reality
post.body:
Altered Reality is my singleplayer Prey mod, the first episode of which was released earlier this month. It is set one month after the main events in Prey and follows Tommy after his first victory, when he discovers that the Dark Ones have returned and a seemingly omnipotent force is slowly unravelling his reality.

For the second episode, I need a voice actor to play the part of Enisi, Tommy's grandfather. If you haven't played the game, Enisi is a wise old man, who teaches and advises Tommy.
There are 5 lines you'll have to pronounce, which comprise a dialogue between Tommy and Enisi. Please PM me if you're interested.
